title: Carrara Marble Countertop - 120x60cm
description: This Carrara marble countertop is a beautiful and durable option for your kitchen or bathroom. It is made from high-quality marble that is known for its elegant white color and striking veining. The countertop is also easy to care for and maintain.

title: Silestone Quartz Countertop - 120x60cm
description: This Silestone quartz countertop is a beautiful and durable option for your kitchen or bathroom. It is made from high-quality quartz that is known for its strength and resistance to stains and scratches. The countertop is also easy to care for and maintain.
